mapper.update: update sys_role set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, available, create_time, update_time from sys_role
SELECT t1.id, t1.name, t1.description, t1.available, t1.create_time, t1.update_time FROM sys_role t1 INNER JOIN sys_user_role t2 ON t1.id=t2.role_id WHERE t1.available=1 AND t2.user_id=#{id}
